channel.title: Dragon Claws spec help
channel.description:
I just added Dragon Claws to my server. Now, I need to get working the spec. How can I do that ?
Thanks, if you have any code, post it here please.

item.title: Dragon Claws spec help
item.dc:creator: @maxmurks maxmurks
item.description:
@maxmurks wrote:

Oh right sorry i fail. Xd

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws spec help
item.dc:creator: @maxmurks maxmurks
item.description:
@maxmurks wrote:

Just open your item.java and scroll to the bottom and add them like so->item = 8002 Dragon_Claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 100 100 100 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 BTW change the 100s and 150s to whatever you want the bonuses to be. XD

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws spec help
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

omg i found the best tut tyvm to the guy whos posted about 3 posts down

Here is ur guide for 100% working d claws 4 hit special

  1. search for this:
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Directly near the top.

  1. now under that add:

public boolean DCDamg = false;
public int DCdown = 0;

3)now search for:

[code]

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698[/code]

and should see something like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ startAnimation(0x426); specialAtkNPC(false, 0, 252, 0x426); getHit(25); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; startAnimation(0x426); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 25; int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; }

  1. Now right under that add:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(8);
usingSpecial = true;
}
  1. now for the npcs, search this from where u added the code above:

[code]

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698[/code]

u should see this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); }

under that add this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

  1. now search for:

[code]

public boolean process() {[/code]

under that add this:

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamgNPC(30); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } } if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamg(25); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

now you can save and compile.

  1. open your special.java and add this under:

case 5698:

you will have to search case 5698: 2 times because there are 2 of them.

now under both of the 2 cases 5698: add this:

case 8002:

save and compile and you are done.

Hoped it helps@

^ thanks DarkBow Pkz.

Read full topic
